articles.description: Manchester United manager Erik ten Hag says he is "not Harry Potter" after Sunday's chastening 3-0 home defeat by Liverpool.
articles.title: 'I'm not Harry Potter' - Ten Hag defends Man Utd after Liverpool loss

articles.description: Mohamed Salah says it is his "last year" at Liverpool and that nobody at the club has talked to him about a new contract.
articles.title: Mohamed Salah contract: Liverpool forward says it is his 'last year' with club

articles.description: Defending champion Coco Gauff loses to fellow American Emma Navarro in the fourth round of the US Open.
articles.title: US Open 2024 results: Coco Gauff's title defence ended by Emma Navarro in fourth round

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Real Madrid vs Real Betis in the Primera División
articles.title: Real Madrid vs Real Betis: Primera División - BBC Sport

articles.description: Scottie Scheffler underlines his status as the world's number one golfer with a dominant victory at the season-ending Tour Championship in Atlanta.
articles.title: Scottie Scheffler wins Tour Championship from Collin Morikawa at East Lake

articles.description: Ollie Pope has done a fine job as England's stand-in captain but must find a serenity to his batting, says Jonathan Agnew.
articles.title: England v Sri Lanka: Ollie Pope needs to find calm at crease - Jonathan Agnew

articles.description: Great Britain celebrate their most successful day at a Paralympic Games this century with 12 gold medals on a record-breaking super Sunday at Paris 2024.
articles.title: Paris 2024 Paralympics: GB win 12 golds on record-breaking super Sunday

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Manchester United vs Liverpool in the Premier League
articles.title: Manchester United vs Liverpool: Premier League - BBC Sport

articles.description: Eberechi Eze scores a superb equaliser as Crystal Palace pick up their first point of the season with a draw at Chelsea.
articles.title: Chelsea 1-1 Crystal Palace: Eze stunner earns Eagles a draw

articles.description: Alexander Isak nets the winner as Newcastle edge Tottenham to maintain their unbeaten start to the Premier League season.
articles.title: Newcastle 2-1 Tottenham: Magpies maintain unbeaten start to campaign with win over Spurs
